briefdescription.para: Raised whenever the master volume gets changed.
Raised whenever the global microphone mute gets changed.
Raised whenever the audio output device gets changed.
The currently active audio output device.
Returns the master volume for the device.
static instance of the MLAudio class

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if AudioCaptureMic privilege is denied.

briefdescription.para: Returns the master volume for the audio system. The range of the volume is 0-10, with 0 being silent and 10 being full volume.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if a parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if AudioCaptureMic privilege is denied.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AudioNotImplemented if the function is not implemented.

briefdescription.para: Returns the mute state of the microphone.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if a parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if AudioCaptureMic privilege is denied.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AudioNotImplemented if the function is not implemented.

briefdescription.para: Registers a callback for the device volume change event.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if a parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if AudioCaptureMic privilege is denied.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AudioNotImplemented if the function is not implemented.

briefdescription.para: Unregisters a previously registered callback for the device volume change event.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if a parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if AudioCaptureMic privilege is denied.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AudioNotImplemented if the function is not implemented.

briefdescription.para: Registers a callback for the device microphone mute change event.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if a parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if AudioCaptureMic privilege is denied.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AudioNotImplemented if the function is not implemented.

briefdescription.para: Unregisters a previously registered callback for the device microphone mute change event.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if a parameter is invalid.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if AudioCaptureMic privilege is denied.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AudioNotImplemented if the function is not implemented.
